analysis_summary: Market is bullish with medium volatility and bearish leverage sentiment. BTC and BNB rank highest with strong qlib scores, negative funding rates suggesting short squeeze potential, and neutral RSI. Existing BNB and SOL positions are still valid (prices near entry, no invalidation triggers hit). No new positions opened due to max position limit of 3 already reached.

Bearish market with high volatility and extreme fear sentiment. BNB and SOL positions are held due to strong Qlib scores and favorable funding rates, but no new positions are opened to limit risk in current conditions.

actions.entry_reason: Qlib Rank #1, low RSI, positive funding rate supports long bias.

exit_plan.invalidation: Funding rate exceeds 0.03% or RSI drops below 25

actions.entry_reason: Qlib Rank #2, negative funding rate indicates short squeeze potential, RSI oversold.

exit_plan.invalidation: Funding rate flips positive > 0.01% or OI increases significantly
